content.query:
USE electric_vehicle_ldw
GO

/*Se requiere obtener la informacion sobre los "vehiculos registrados" asi como
información sobre el "propietario" del vehiculo, dicha información debe estar listada por "año" y "mes" en especifico.*/

EXEC gold.usp_gold_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month '2024' '01' GO
EXEC gold.usp_gold_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month '2024' '02' GO
EXEC gold.usp_gold_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month '2024' '03' GO
EXEC gold.usp_gold_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month '2024' '04' GO
EXEC gold.usp_gold_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month '2024' '05' GO
EXEC gold.usp_gold_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month '2024' '06' GO
EXEC gold.usp_gold_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month '2024' '07' GO
EXEC gold.usp_gold_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month '2024' '08' GO
EXEC gold.usp_gold_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month '2024' '09' GO
EXEC gold.usp_gold_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month '2024' '10' GO
EXEC gold.usp_gold_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month '2024' '11' GO
EXEC gold.usp_gold_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month '2024' '12' GO


/*
SELECT c.year, c.month,
        vr.registration_date, 
        v.vin, v.model_year, v.make, v.model, v.electric_range, v.longitude, v.latitude,
        l.county,l.city, l.state, l.postal_code
FROM silver.vw_vehicle_registration vr
INNER JOIN silver.vehicle v ON (vr.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id)
INNER JOIN silver.location l ON (vr.location_id = l.location_id)
INNER JOIN silver.calendar c ON (CAST(vr.registration_date AS DATE) = c.date) 
WHERE c.year = '2024' AND c.month = '06'
ORDER BY v.vin, vr.registration_date
GO
*/
